this week? I am trying to get there for a Batto
Taikai. Bob Elder
--- Gordon Robson <robsongo@...> wrote:

> Hi Ron,
> 
> I think the nakago has been shortened for mounting
> as a sword. It is  
> a very thick blade, but a lot of swords we see now
> have been polished  
> way down, so it is not that strange to me.
> 
> Gordon
>

> > http://tinyurl.com/q4uz2
